name: Don't Stop Me Now (cogile)
description:
Can you fend off wave after wave of monstrosities with a sword or a hammer?

.....................................................................................................

Avoid dangerous traps and use holy fountains to recover HP!

................................................

As more and more enemies appear, only skilled warriors will be able to defeat the hordes of evil and remain victorious.

Go through two unique stages and reach the end of both, if you can that is.

The game was created with the limitation from Mini-Jam 99 --> Can't Stop Moving

I N S T R U C T I O N S

-Use the mouse to aim your weapon

-Left-click with the sword for a strong attack

-Knock enemies into walls with the hammer for a strong attack

-Fountains give you health

-Every minute the difficulty increases

-If you survive for 5 minutes and kill all the enemies you have completed the level!
